movie.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movie.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
movie.plot: A young boy from Tatooine sets out on an adventure with an old Jedi named Obi-Wan Kenobi as his mentor to save Princess Leia from the ruthless Darth Vader and Destroy the Death Star built by the Empire which has the power to destroy the entire galaxy.
movie.tomatoConsensus: A legendarily expansive and ambitious start to the sci-fi saga, George Lucas opened our eyes to the possiblites of blockbuster filmmaking and things have never been the same.
